trans-unit.source: Represents an object that monitors changes to files.
trans-unit.target: 表示监视对文件的更改的对象。

trans-unit.source: The FileChangeMonitor class is a base <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor> type for classes that monitor changes to files.
trans-unit.target: FileChangeMonitor 类为基准<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor>监视对文件的更改的类类型。</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor>

trans-unit.source: To create a monitor for changes in the file system, you can inherit from this class.
trans-unit.target: 若要在文件系统中创建监视的更改，你可以从此类继承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor"></xref> class.
This constructor is called from constructors in derived classes in order to initialize the base class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数从派生类中的构造函数调用才能初始化类的基类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the paths of files that are monitored for changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含监视的更改的文件的路径的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection is typically set in the constructor of a derived <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor> type.
trans-unit.target: 通常，将集合设置派生的构造函数中<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor>类型。</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor>

trans-unit.source: To provide custom file-change monitoring, you must override this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供自定义的文件更改监视，必须重写此方法在派生类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the last time that a file that is being monitored was changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示正在监视的文件已更改的最后一个时间。

trans-unit.source: The value of the LastModified property is typically calculated during the initialization phase of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类的初始化阶段通常计算 LastModified 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: To provide custom file change monitoring, you must override this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供自定义的文件更改监视，必须重写此方法在派生类。

trans-unit.source: If multiple files are monitored, the last modified time of the most recently modified file; otherwise, the last time that the file that is being monitored was changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果监视多个文件，上次修改时间的最近修改过的文件;否则上, 一次，正在监视的文件已更改。
